name: Intermission (LaCrearthur)
description:
Coordinate your actions in this intermission in order to get your levels as clean as possible before the next "player" starts his game ! 

This is a coop-multiplayer game from 1 to 4 players on the same screen, inspired by Overcooked! 

You have to rebuild levels from Super Mario Bros. in a short amount of time, following a pattern that is only shown at the beginning of the game and using your memory to manage this task. 

Known issues : - There are some bugs when grabbing a block, if you aren't able to move when you're holding a block, drop it and grab it again
